We will share music or video to your friends, The APP needs your consent to obtain the permission of the media library
If not allowed, you will not be able to use functions such as taking pictures and scanning

The app does not connect to devices on your network, it only detects connectivity to your local gateway. Users can also modify the permission settings of this App in the iOS device's Settings-Privacy-Local Web interface
Apps need your consent to access location information to search for nearby friends' locations

The APP needs your consent to obtain location information when using it, so as to search for the location of nearby friends
The APP needs your consent to use the microphone for video recording, voice recognition, and voice chat to share with your friends
The APP needs your consent to access the photo album for saving pictures
The APP needs your consent to access the album for easy picture selection, uploading and publishing
The APP needs your consent to perform speech recognition for a better user experience
